title: The Asset Allocator: Behind The Idea Reviews Joel Greenblatt’s ‘You Can Be A Stock Market Genius,’ Part 3
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: My esteemed Seeking Alpha colleagues Mike Taylor and Daniel Shvartsman continue their review of Joel Greenblatt’s approach to value investing. In this third of four installments (47:21), they analyze Greenblatt’s take on bankruptcies, LEAPs, restructurings, and still 'odder' corners of the market. In particular, Greenblatt discusses when to hold and when to sell, and embraces leverage. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
